markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Zephyr Hawk](/Monsters.aspx?ID=177)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Zephyr hawks drift among the currents of the Plane of Air in great flocks.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Elemental](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Zephyr Hawk](/Monsters.aspx?ID=177)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Air" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=5" />
<trait label="Elemental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=57" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 144</row>

**Perception** +7; darkvision

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +13, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +11

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +4

**Con** +1

**Int** -4

**Wis** +0

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +6 

**Ref** +13 

**Will** +7 

</row>

**HP** 36

**Immunities**
bleed, paralyzed, poison, sleep

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** fly 50 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
wing +11 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 1d8+4 slashing

**Circling Attack** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The zephyr hawk Flies up to half its Speed, makes two wing Strikes, then Flies up to half its Speed again to return to its original location. The second half of this movement doesn’t trigger reactions. Both attacks count toward the zephyr hawk’s multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn’t increase until after it makes both attacks.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-41" />
name: Zephyr Hawk

text: Zephyr Hawk Zephyr hawks drift among the currents of the Plane of Air in great flocks. Recall Knowledge - Elemental (Arcana, Nature): DC 18 Unspecific Lore : DC 16 Specific Lore : DC 13 Zephyr Hawk Source Bestiary pg. 144 Perception +7; darkvision Languages Skills Acrobatics +13, Stealth +11 Str +2 Dex +4 Con +1 Int -4 Wis +0 Cha +0 --- AC 21 Fort +6 Ref +13 Will +7 HP 36 Immunities bleed, paralyzed, poison, sleep --- Speed fly 50 feet Melee Single Action wing +11 (Agile, Finesse), Damage 1d8+4 slashing Circling Attack Two Actions The zephyr hawk Flies up to half its Speed, makes two wing Strikes, then Flies up to half its Speed again to return to its original location. The second half of this movement doesn’t trigger reactions. Both attacks count toward the zephyr hawk’s multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn’t increase until after it makes both attacks.
